revised_title: Aerosol Pollution from Internal Combustion Engines: A Comprehensive Review
tldr: This article discusses the various types of aerosol pollutants produced by internal combustion engines, such as petrol and diesel engines, and aircraft turbojet engines. It highlights the sources of emissions, their impact on the environment, and the potential health and safety concerns they pose. The authors also review the existing legislation and future concerns related to aerosol pollution.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Air Pollution and Emissions
